name: Battle Medic
entries: At 11th level, you can heal your wounds on the fly. If you drop to 0 hit points and donâ€™t die outright, you can use your reaction to make a DC 15 Medicine Check. If you succeed,you drop to 1 hit point instead.
Each time you use this feature after the first, the DC increases by 5. When you finish a short or long rest, the DC resets to 10.
